Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison
ShortDescription: NB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 157 Streeterville/Taylor, and 60 Blue Island/26th buses temp. rerouted via Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and Canal, near Canal/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and Canal, due to water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus and #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at South Shore/77th
ShortDescription: N5 South Shore Night Bus & 71 71st/South Shore are rerouted via South Shore, 79th, Coles & 75th due to street blockage near South Shore/77th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#N5 South Shore Night Bus & 71 71st/South Shore is temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near South Shore/77th.

  • #N5 South Shore Night Bus and #71 71st/South Shore buses will operate in both directions via South Shore, 79th, Coles and 75th, then resume their regular routes.

Allow extra travel time.
